description: This Python source file demonstrates how to use multiple MCP servers within an agent, including setup, initialization, and execution of asynchronous tasks related to location-based queries.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent that interacts with tools and processes messages.

classes.name: MultiMCPTools
classes.description: Manages multiple MCP server tools for location-based services.

methods.name: run_agent
methods.description: Asynchronously runs the agent with a given message, initializing MCP tools and handling responses.
